metadata.titleEn: Land cover dataset with 30m spatial resolution over Qilian Mountain area  (1985-2017) V1.0
metadata.titleCn: 祁连山区域30m土地覆盖分类产品数据集（1985-2017）V1.0
metadata.description: This dataset contains land cover products in Qilian Mountain Area from 1985 to 2017 every 5 years. The dataset was produced by two steps. Firstly, land cover product in 2015 is produced using time series Landsat-8/OLI data. In view of the different NDVI time series curves of various land features with time variation, the knowledge of different land features is summarized, the extraction rules of different land features are set, and the land cover classification map in 2015 is obtained. The classification system refers to IGBP and FROM_LC classification system. It is divided into 10 categories: cultivated land, woodland, grassland, shrub, wetland, water body, impermeable surface, bare land, glacier and snow cover. According to the accuracy evaluation of Google Earth high-definition image and field survey data, the overall accuracy of land cover classification products in 2015 is as high as 92.19%. Secondly, taking the land cover classification products in 2015 as the base map, a large number of samples are selected according to the proportion of different types. Based on the Landsat series data and powerful data processing ability of Google Earth Engine platform, the random forest classifier is selected to train the band information and NDVI, MNDWI, NDBI and other indices by using the idea of in-depth learning. The land of each five-year period from 1985 to 2017 is produced. By comparing two classified products in 2015, it is concluded that the land cover classified products based on Google Earth Engine platform have good consistency with those based on time series method. In conclusion, the land cover data set in the core area of Qilian Mountains has high overall accuracy , and the method based on sample training of Google Earth Engine platform can expand the existing classification products in time and space, and the frequency of every five years can reflect more land cover type change information in long time series.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据集包括祁连山区域1990年至2017年每5年一期的30m土地覆盖分类产品。该产品首先利用Landsat-8/OLI构造2015年时间序列数据，针对各类地物随时间变化呈现的NDVI时间序列曲线不同，对不同地物特征进行知识归纳，设定提取规则不同地物信息，得到2015年的土地覆盖分类图。分类系统参考了IGBP分类系统和FROM_LC分类系统，共分为耕地、林地、草地、灌丛、湿地、水体、不透水面、裸地、冰川和积雪共10大类。由Google Earth高清影像和实地调研数据进行精度评价，得出2015年土地覆盖分类产品的总体精度高达92.19%。以2015年的土地覆盖分类产品为底图，按各类别的比例选取大量样本，基于Google Earth Engine平台的Landsat系列数据和强大地数据处理能力，利用深度学习的思想，选取随机森林分类器，对波段信息和NDVI、MNDWI、NDBI等指数进行样本训练，生产出1985-2017年每5年一期的土地覆盖分类产品。对2套2015年的分类产品进行比较，得出基于Google Earth Engine平台生产的土地覆盖分类产品与基于时间序列方法得到的分类产品具有很好的一致性。总之，祁连山核心区的土地覆盖数据集具有较高的总体精度，且基于Google Earth Engine平台样本训练的方法能够在时间和空间上对现有的分类产品进行扩展，每5年一期的频次能够在长时间序列上反映更多的土地覆盖类型变化信息。

background: The increased information on time dimension of time series HJ-1/CCD data improves the classification accuracy for most of the land cover types including water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands; consequently, the overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient have 10% and 0.1 improvements respectively. The advantage of HJ-1/CCD data in land cover/use classification makes it a reference for new remote sensing satellite or sensor development. Overall, a new land cover/use classification method using HJ-1/CCD data based on time series analysis is developed and this method does improve the classification accuracy compared with the method using single remote sensing data. In addition, the introducing of the very high spatial resolution data within Google Earth can also improve the sampling accuracy and lower the cost of data purchasing and field campaigns.
research objective: Therefore, by taking the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data we propose a new method for finer resolution land cover mapping using time series HJ-1/CCD data, which can greatly improve the land cover mapping accuracy.
challenges: This method uses much more data and dramatically increases the computation loading; the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
methods: In this study, the advantages of HJ-1/CCD on spatial resolution and temporal frequency are fully taken to make a time series data with 30 m spatial resolution of experimental areas. The land cover classification method using time series HJ-1/CCD data includes six steps, which are detailed as follows: (1) Constructing the time series HJ-1/CCD data. In order to take advantages of HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping, the composite of experimental areas is made using multi-scenes of HJ-1/CCD images, and 12 composites corresponding to 12 months in 2010 are made, which are made up the time series images of the experimental areas yearly. (2) Data preprocessing. After the data are prepared, the data pre-processes including geometric correction, radiometric calibration and atmospheric correction need to be done to make a “perfect” time series HJ-1/CCD data composite. (3) NDVI calculating. Instead of time series of HJ-1/CCD data, time series of NDVI are used as the input of SVM for classification. (1) Sampling. The classifier used in this study is SVM, which needs a good sample set for training purpose. (2) SVM classification. Support Vector Machine (SVM) is a robotic learning method developed from statistics learning theory and optimization theory in the 1990s. (3) Post-classification. Some of the land cover types are very difficult to separate, so some extra work needs to be done to improve the classification accuracy.
dataset: The data are downloaded for free at websites of Satellite Environment Center, Ministry of Environmental Protection or China Center of Resources Satellite Data and Application. The HJ-1 satellite constellation consists of three satellites, named as HJ-1A, HJ-1B, and HJ-1C respectively. HJ-1A has two CCD cameras and one hyperspectral instrument onboard; HJ-1B has two CCD cameras and one infrared camera onboard; HJ-1C is a SAR satellite. For CCD cameras, their nominal spatial resolution is 30 m. HJ-1/CCDs have three visible bands (430–520 nm, 520–600 nm, and 630–690 nm) and one near-infrared band (760–900 nm).
findings: In our two study areas, the very high resolution remote sensing data within Google Earth are used to validate the land cover mapping results, which shows a very high mapping accuracy of 95.76% and 83.78% and a high Kappa coefficient of 0.9423 and 0.8165 in the Dahuofang area of Liaoning Province and the Heiquan area of Gansu Province respectively.
backgroundCn: 时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的时间维度信息增加，提高了大多数土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，包括水体、城市地区、森林和农田；因此，整体准确率和Kappa系数分别提高了10%和0.1。HJ-1/CCD数据在土地覆盖/使用分类中的优势使其成为新遥感卫星或传感器开发的参考。总体而言，基于时间序列分析的HJ-1/CCD数据的新土地覆盖/使用分类方法的开发确实提高了分类准确性，相较于使用单一遥感数据的方法。此外，引入Google Earth中的非常高空间分辨率数据也可以提高采样准确性，并降低数据购买和实地考察的成本。
research objectiveCn: 因此，通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势，我们提出了一种新的方法，利用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行更精细的土地覆盖制图，这可以大大提高土地覆盖制图的准确性。
challengesCn: 该方法使用了更多的数据，并显著增加了计算负载；HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳降低了其可用性，并增加了使用上的难度。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，充分利用HJ-1/CCD在空间分辨率和时间频率上的优势，制作了具有30米空间分辨率的实验区时间序列数据。使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据的土地覆盖分类方法包括六个步骤，具体如下：（1）构建时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据。为了利用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图，使用多场景HJ-1/CCD影像制作实验区的合成影像，制作了12个对应于2010年12个月的合成影像，构成了实验区的年度时间序列影像。（2）数据预处理。在数据准备好后，需要进行几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正等数据预处理，以制作“完美”的时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据合成影像。（3）NDVI计算。使用NDVI时间序列作为支持向量机（SVM）分类的输入，而不是HJ-1/CCD数据的时间序列。（4）采样。本研究中使用的分类器是SVM，它需要一个良好的样本集用于训练。（5）SVM分类。支持向量机（SVM）是一种基于统计学习理论和优化理论发展起来的机器学习方法，起源于1990年代。（6）后分类。由于某些土地覆盖类型非常难以区分，因此需要进行一些额外的工作以提高分类精度。
datasetCn: 数据可以在卫星环境中心、环境保护部或中国资源卫星数据与应用中心的网站上免费下载。HJ-1卫星星座由三颗卫星组成，分别命名为HJ-1A、HJ-1B和HJ-1C。HJ-1A上搭载有两台CCD相机和一台高光谱仪；HJ-1B上搭载有两台CCD相机和一台红外相机；HJ-1C是一颗合成孔径雷达（SAR）卫星。对于CCD相机，其标称空间分辨率为30米。HJ-1/CCD具有三个可见光波段（430–520纳米、520–600纳米和630–690纳米）和一个近红外波段（760–900纳米）。
findingsCn: 在我们的两个研究区域，使用Google Earth中的超高分辨率遥感数据来验证土地覆盖制图结果，显示出大连高的制图准确率，分别为95.76%和83.78%，以及高Kappa系数，分别为0.9423和0.8165，在辽宁省的大伙房地区和甘肃省的黑泉地区。

background: Land-cover datasets are crucial for research on eco-hydrological processes and earth system modeling. Remote sensing has become widely used as a macro-observing system for land-cover mapping, which can substitute for plant functional type (PFT) as the baseline. Several moderate to fine resolution global land-cover datasets, which are presented in detail in Table I, based on different satellite sensors are available from different research groups. These land-cover datasets listed in Table I have large variability for three reasons: 1) the data quality and properties are different; 2) there is no standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories; and 3) they are not consistent with the Earth System Model’s (ESM) requirements, because the concept of PFT, whose traits represent a combination of spectral relationships, and climatic, ecological, and theoretical assumptions, used in ESMs cannot be mapped directly using remote-sensing land-cover datasets. The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
research objective: In order to improve the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling in the HRB, a comprehensive method for mapping monthly land cover with fine spatial resolution and more categories of crop/vegetation is developed by using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands.
challenges: The highest uncertainty in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery occurs most frequently between the cropland and grassland categories and in dryland systems among the shrub, grassland, and forest categories because of differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
methods: The procedure for constructing time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD is introduced as follows and the details of the procedure can be found in [26]. Geometric correction: A mosaic of the HRB is made using Landsat/TM imagery. The mosaic of Landsat/TM is used as the base image and all HJ-1/CCD images are automatically corrected through the image-to-image registration method by [43]. Radiometric calibration: Converting the DN values of the HJ-1/CCD images to top of atmosphere (TOA) radiance with given calibration coefficients. Atmospheric correction: Removing the atmospheric effects of remote-sensing images to obtain the surface reflectance. This correction was achieved with a spatial extension method developed by [44]. After the preprocessing has been done, all the HJ-1/CCD images within 1 month are subset and mosaicked; consequently, 10 mosaics for 10 months in the HRB are made and time series of the HRB mosaics from HJ-1/CCD are constructed.
dataset: The HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data used in this research were provided by the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application (CRESDA, http://www.cresda.com). The Landsat TM/ETM+ data were downloaded from the USGS website (http://landsat.usgs.gov/). The MODIS data were downloaded from the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/). The VHSR data were from Google Earth by Google Inc.
findings: A ground campaign was performed to evaluate the accuracy of crop classification and an overall accuracy of 84.09% for the crop classification was achieved.
backgroundCn: 土地覆盖数据集对于生态水文过程和地球系统建模的研究至关重要。遥感已成为广泛使用的宏观观测系统，用于土地覆盖制图，可以替代植物功能类型（PFT）作为基线。根据不同的卫星传感器，来自不同研究小组的多种中等到精细分辨率的全球土地覆盖数据集可供使用，这些数据集在表I中详细列出。这些土地覆盖数据集的变异性较大，主要有三个原因：1）数据质量和属性不同；2）将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别没有标准方法；3）它们与地球系统模型（ESM）的要求不一致，因为在ESM中使用的PFT概念，其特征代表了一系列光谱关系、气候、生态和理论假设的组合，无法直接通过遥感土地覆盖数据集进行映射。光学遥感影像中土地覆盖分类的不确定性最高，通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱系统中灌木、草地和森林类别之间，因为森林覆盖所需的最小阈值存在差异。
research objectiveCn: 为了提高HRB地区生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性，开发了一种综合方法，通过使用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据，进行每月土地覆盖的细致空间分辨率和更多作物/植被类别的制图。
challengesCn: 光学遥感影像中的土地覆盖分类最高的不确定性通常发生在农田和草地类别之间，以及在干旱地区的灌木、草地和森林类别之间，这主要是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异所致。
methodsCn: 构建HJ-1/CCD HRB马赛克时间序列的程序如下，详细程序可参见[26]。几何校正：使用Landsat/TM影像制作HRB的马赛克。Landsat/TM的马赛克作为基础影像，所有HJ-1/CCD影像通过图像间配准方法自动校正，参考文献[43]。辐射校准：将HJ-1/CCD影像的DN值转换为大气顶（TOA）辐射，使用给定的校准系数。大气校正：去除遥感影像的大气影响，以获得地表反射率。该校正是通过参考文献[44]中开发的空间扩展方法实现的。预处理完成后，将1个月内的所有HJ-1/CCD影像进行子集处理和拼接；因此，HRB区域制作了10个月的10个马赛克，并构建了HJ-1/CCD的HRB马赛克时间序列。
datasetCn: 本研究使用的HJ-1/CCD遥感数据由中国资源卫星数据与应用中心（CRESDA，http://www.cresda.com）提供。Landsat TM/ETM+数据从USGS网站（http://landsat.usgs.gov/）下载。MODIS数据从NASA戈达德太空飞行中心（http://ladsweb.nascom.nasa.gov/）下载。VHSR数据来自谷歌公司（Google Inc.）的Google Earth。
findingsCn: 进行了一项地面调查，以评估作物分类的准确性，最终实现了84.09%的总体准确率。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method that enhances the classification accuracy of land cover types using time series data?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个数据收集方法的例子，该方法利用时间序列数据提高土地覆盖类型的分类准确性？
Example.AnswerEn: The data collection method using HJ-1/CCD time series data enhances classification accuracy by constructing composite images for each month, followed by geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction, NDVI calculation, and SVM classification. This method improves the accuracy of classifying land cover types such as water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD时间序列数据的数据收集方法通过为每个月构建复合图像，随后进行几何校正、辐射校正、大气校正、NDVI计算和SVM分类，从而提高分类精度。这种方法提高了对水体、城市区域、森林和农田等土地覆盖类型的分类准确性。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge in land cover classification that arises from using optical remotely sensed imagery?
Example.QuestionCn: 使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: A challenge in land cover classification using optical remotely sensed imagery is the high uncertainty between categories such as cropland and grassland, or among shrub, grassland, and forest categories in dryland systems. This is due to differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
Example.AnswerCn: 使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类的一大挑战是类别之间的高不确定性，例如农田和草地之间，或干旱地区灌木、草地和森林类别之间。这是由于森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异所致。

Example.QuestionEn: Can you give an example of a dataset that is used for high-resolution land cover mapping and the sources from which it can be obtained?
Example.QuestionCn: 可以给我一个用于高分辨率土地覆盖制图的数据集的例子，以及可以获取该数据集的来源吗？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a dataset used for high-resolution land cover mapping is the HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data, which can be obtained from the China Centre for Resources Satellite Data and Application. Additionally, Landsat TM/ETM+ data can be downloaded from the USGS website, and MODIS data from the NASA Goddard Space Flight Center.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于高分辨率土地覆盖制图的数据集的一个例子是HJ-1/CCD遥感数据，可以从中国资源卫星应用中心获取。此外，Landsat TM/ETM+数据可以从USGS网站下载，MODIS数据可以从NASA戈达德太空飞行中心获取。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the data preprocessing characteristics necessary for constructing a time series dataset from HJ-1/CCD remote-sensing data?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 构建HJ-1/CCD遥感数据的时间序列数据集所需的数据预处理特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: geometric correction, radiometric calibration, atmospheric correction
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 几何校正，辐射定标，大气校正

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What challenges are associated with using HJ-1/CCD data in land cover classification, and how can they affect the data's usability?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类面临哪些挑战，这些挑战如何影响数据的可用性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: increased computational load, large volume of data, suboptimal geometric qualities, suboptimal radiometric qualities
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 计算负载增加，大量数据，几何质量不佳，辐射质量不佳。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many categories are included in the land cover classification system used for the 30m spatial resolution dataset in the Qilian Mountain region?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在祁连山地区的30米空间分辨率数据集中，土地覆盖分类系统包含多少个类别？

Quantification.QuestionEn: What is the overall accuracy percentage achieved by the land cover classification product for the year 2015 in the Qilian Mountain region?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 2015年祁连山地区土地覆盖分类产品的整体准确率百分比是多少？

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many years does the time series dataset for the Qilian Mountain region land cover classification cover, and what is the interval between each data collection point?
Quantification.QuestionCn: Qilian Mountain地区的土地覆盖分类时间序列数据集覆盖了多少年，数据采集点之间的间隔是多少？

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'geometric correction' involve in the context of remote sensing data preprocessing?
Definition.QuestionCn: 在遥感数据预处理的上下文中，“几何校正”涉及什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: Geometric correction in remote sensing data preprocessing involves aligning the satellite images to a reference map or image. This ensures that the images have spatial accuracy, meaning that each pixel in the image corresponds accurately to a location on the Earth's surface. It is a crucial step in preparing the data for analysis.
Definition.AnswerCn: 几何校正是遥感数据预处理中的一个步骤，涉及将卫星图像对齐到参考地图或图像。这确保了图像具有空间精度，即图像中的每个像素准确对应地球表面上的一个位置。这是准备数据进行分析的关键步骤。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data preprocessing steps for constructing time series using HJ-1/CCD compare with those applied in the generation of the 30m land cover classification product using Landsat data?
Comparison.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD构建时间序列的数据预处理步骤与使用Landsat数据生成30米土地覆盖分类产品所应用的步骤有何不同？
Comparison.AnswerEn: Both data preprocessing steps involve geometric correction and radiometric calibration. However, the HJ-1/CCD process includes atmospheric correction specifically to obtain surface reflectance, which is not explicitly mentioned for the Landsat data process. The Landsat process focuses on constructing a time series using NDVI and other indices for classification, while the HJ-1/CCD process involves creating yearly composites and mosaics for time series construction.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 两个数据预处理步骤都涉及几何校正和辐射校正。然而，HJ-1/CCD 过程特别包括大气校正，以获得地表反射率，而 Landsat 数据过程没有明确提到这一点。Landsat 过程侧重于使用 NDVI 和其他指数进行分类构建时间序列，而 HJ-1/CCD 过程则涉及创建年度合成和马赛克以构建时间序列。

Comparison.QuestionEn: In what ways do the challenges of using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover classification differ from those encountered with Landsat data in the creation of land cover datasets?
Comparison.QuestionCn: HJ-1/CCD数据在土地覆盖分类中的挑战与Landsat数据在创建土地覆盖数据集时遇到的挑战有哪些不同之处？
Comparison.AnswerEn: HJ-1/CCD data challenges include increased computational load and issues with geometric and radiometric quality, which affect usability. In contrast, the Landsat-based dataset focuses on using NDVI time series and deep learning approaches, indicating challenges more related to sample selection and classification rules rather than data quality per se.
Comparison.AnswerCn: HJ-1/CCD 数据面临的挑战包括计算负荷增加以及几何和辐射质量问题，这影响了其可用性。相比之下，基于 Landsat 的数据集则侧重于使用 NDVI 时间序列和深度学习方法，表明其面临的挑战更多与样本选择和分类规则相关，而不是数据质量本身。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise in utilizing multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data for improving land cover mapping accuracy?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在利用多种分类器和多源遥感数据提高土地覆盖制图精度时，可能会出现哪些挑战？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Challenges include the increased computational load due to using more data, and issues with geometric and radiometric quality of certain datasets like HJ-1/CCD, which affect usability. Additionally, uncertainty in classification often occurs between similar land cover types like cropland and grassland or among shrub, grassland, and forest categories in dryland systems, due to differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于使用更多数据而导致的计算负担增加，以及某些数据集（如HJ-1/CCD）的几何和辐射质量问题，这影响了可用性。此外，在干旱地区系统中，由于森林覆盖的最低阈值要求不同，分类的不确定性通常发生在相似的土地覆盖类型之间，如农田和草地，或灌木、草地和森林类别之间。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What are the potential benefits of integrating very high spatial resolution data from platforms like Google Earth in land cover mapping projects?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 将非常高空间分辨率的数据（如谷歌地球）整合到土地覆盖制图项目中可能带来的潜在好处包括：
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Integrating very high spatial resolution data from Google Earth can significantly improve sampling accuracy and reduce data purchasing and field campaign costs. It also offers a reliable reference for validating land cover mapping results, contributing to higher overall accuracy and helping to address uncertainties in classification between similar land cover types.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 整合来自谷歌地球的非常高空间分辨率数据可以显著提高采样准确性，并降低数据购买和实地考察的成本。它还为验证土地覆盖制图结果提供了可靠的参考，有助于提高整体准确性，并帮助解决相似土地覆盖类型之间的分类不确定性。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the high accuracy of land cover classification in the Qilian Mountain region using time series data?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在使用时间序列数据对祁连山地区进行土地覆盖分类时，哪些因素有助于提高分类的高准确性？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The high accuracy in land cover classification for the Qilian Mountain region is attributed to the construction of time series data using Landsat-8/OLI, which allows for the analysis of NDVI time series curves to understand land feature characteristics. Additionally, the use of deep learning methods and the Google Earth Engine platform enhances the processing and analysis capabilities, leading to a high overall accuracy of 92.19% for the 2015 classification.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 对祁连山地区土地覆盖分类的高准确性归因于利用Landsat-8/OLI构建的时间序列数据，这使得能够分析NDVI时间序列曲线以理解土地特征特性。此外，深度学习方法和Google Earth Engine平台的使用增强了处理和分析能力，从而使2015年的分类整体准确率达到92.19%。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why might remote sensing data present challenges in land-cover classification, particularly between certain categories like cropland and grassland?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 遥感数据在土地覆盖分类中可能会面临挑战，特别是在某些类别之间，如农田和草地。
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Remote sensing data can present challenges in land-cover classification due to high uncertainty in distinguishing between categories like cropland and grassland. This is often due to the variability in data quality, lack of standardized classification approaches, and the difficulty in meeting minimum threshold requirements for certain categories like forest cover in dryland systems.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 遥感数据在土地覆盖分类中可能面临挑战，因为在区分农田和草地等类别时存在较高的不确定性。这通常是由于数据质量的变异性、缺乏标准化的分类方法，以及在干旱系统中满足某些类别（如森林覆盖）最低阈值要求的困难。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What are the reasons behind the computational challenges faced when using time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover classification?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类时面临的计算挑战的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The computational challenges when using time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover classification arise from the substantial data volume and the increased processing load. Moreover, the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of the HJ-1/CCD data add complexity to its usability and require extensive preprocessing, such as geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction, to improve data quality.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类时，计算挑战主要来自于数据量庞大和处理负担加重。此外，HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳增加了其可用性的复杂性，需要进行广泛的预处理，如几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正，以提高数据质量。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What is the impact on the classification accuracy when using NDVI time series analysis for land cover classification compared to using single remote sensing data?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用NDVI时间序列分析进行土地覆盖分类与使用单一遥感数据相比，对分类准确性的影响是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of NDVI time series analysis improves the classification accuracy for most land cover types, including water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands. This approach results in a 10% improvement in overall accuracy and a 0.1 increase in the Kappa coefficient compared to using single remote sensing data.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: NDVI时间序列分析的使用提高了大多数土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，包括水体、城市地区、森林和农田。与使用单一遥感数据相比，这种方法使整体准确性提高了10%，Kappa系数增加了0.1。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential challenges in using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的潜在挑战有哪些？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The main challenges include increased computation loading due to the use of more data, and the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data, which lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 主要挑战包括由于使用更多数据而导致的计算负载增加，以及HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，这降低了其可用性并增加了使用难度。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the use of diverse satellite sensors affect the variability in global land-cover datasets?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 多样化卫星传感器的使用如何影响全球土地覆盖数据集的变异性？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of different satellite sensors contributes to variability in global land-cover datasets due to varying data quality and properties, the absence of a standard approach for classifying continuous vegetation cover into discrete categories, and inconsistencies with Earth System Model requirements.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 不同卫星传感器的使用导致全球土地覆盖数据集的变异性，这主要是由于数据质量和属性的差异、将连续植被覆盖分类为离散类别的标准方法缺失，以及与地球系统模型要求的不一致性。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the goals of utilizing time series HJ-1/CCD data for land cover mapping in terms of accuracy and spatial resolution?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 利用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图的目标在于提高准确性和空间分辨率。
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The goal is to improve classification accuracy by exploiting the spatiotemporal advantage of HJ-1/CCD data, which can enhance land cover mapping accuracy, especially for water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands. The use of time series data rather than single remote sensing data aims to achieve finer resolution land cover mapping.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目标是通过利用HJ-1/CCD数据的时空优势来提高分类准确性，这可以增强土地覆盖制图的准确性，特别是对于水体、城市区域、森林和农田。使用时间序列数据而不是单一遥感数据旨在实现更精细的土地覆盖制图。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the intention behind using Google Earth Engine and deep learning for land cover classification over long time series?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 使用Google Earth Engine和深度学习进行长期时间序列土地覆盖分类的意图是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The intention is to leverage the powerful data processing capabilities of Google Earth Engine and the robust classification performance of deep learning methods to produce land cover classification products over a long time series. This approach aims to extend existing classification products in both time and space, reflecting more detailed land cover type changes.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 目的是利用Google Earth Engine强大的数据处理能力和深度学习方法的强大分类性能，生成长期时间序列的土地覆盖分类产品。这种方法旨在在时间和空间上扩展现有的分类产品，反映更详细的土地覆盖类型变化。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedural steps are involved in constructing a time series dataset for land cover classification using remote sensing data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 构建用于土地覆盖分类的时间序列数据集的程序步骤包括以下几个方面：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The procedural steps include constructing a time series from HJ-1/CCD data by creating composites using multi-scenes of images for 12 months, followed by data preprocessing which involves geometric correction, radiometric calibration, and atmospheric correction to prepare a 'perfect' time series data composite. NDVI is calculated and used as an input for classification. Sampling is conducted for training, and the SVM classification method is applied, followed by post-classification steps to improve accuracy.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 程序步骤包括从HJ-1/CCD数据构建时间序列，通过创建12个月的多场景图像合成，随后进行数据预处理，包括几何校正、辐射校正和大气校正，以准备“完美”的时间序列数据合成。计算NDVI并将其作为分类的输入。进行采样以进行训练，应用SVM分类方法，随后进行后分类步骤以提高准确性。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How is the accuracy of land cover classification verified using very high-resolution remote sensing data?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何使用超高分辨率遥感数据验证土地覆盖分类的准确性？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The accuracy of land cover classification is verified by using very high-resolution remote sensing data within Google Earth to validate the mapping results. This method demonstrated high mapping accuracy with values like 95.76% and 83.78% and a high Kappa coefficient in different study areas.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 土地覆盖分类的准确性通过使用谷歌地球中的超高分辨率遥感数据进行验证，以验证制图结果。这种方法在不同研究区域显示出高制图准确性，准确率值如95.76%和83.78%，以及较高的Kappa系数。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the methods employed to overcome challenges in land-cover classification from optical remotely sensed imagery?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 克服光学遥感影像土地覆盖分类挑战的方法有哪些？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To overcome challenges such as classification uncertainty, a comprehensive method using multiple classifiers and multisource remotely sensed data with different spatio-temporal resolutions and spectral bands is developed. This approach improves the accuracy of eco-hydrological and land-process modeling by constructing time series mosaics, applying geometric and radiometric corrections, and using atmospheric correction techniques.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了克服分类不确定性等挑战，开发了一种综合方法，利用多种分类器和具有不同时空分辨率和光谱波段的多源遥感数据。该方法通过构建时间序列马赛克、应用几何和辐射校正以及使用大气校正技术，提高了生态水文和土地过程建模的准确性。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How can the integration of Google Earth Engine platform capabilities enable more efficient land cover classification over extended time periods?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 谷歌地球引擎平台能力的整合如何能够在较长时间段内实现更高效的土地覆盖分类？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The Google Earth Engine platform provides powerful data processing capabilities and access to extensive Landsat series data, enabling the use of deep learning techniques like random forest classifiers for training on various indices. This approach facilitates the production of land cover classification products over extended time periods with high accuracy and consistency.
Enablement.AnswerCn: Google Earth Engine平台提供强大的数据处理能力和广泛的Landsat系列数据访问，使得可以使用深度学习技术，如随机森林分类器，对各种指数进行训练。这种方法促进了在较长时间段内高精度和一致性的土地覆盖分类产品的生成。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What challenges need to be addressed to enable the effective use of HJ-1/CCD data in land cover mapping?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 为了有效利用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖制图，需要解决哪些挑战？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Challenges include managing the increased computation load due to the large volume of data, and overcoming the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data that can limit its usability. Addressing these challenges is essential for improving the usability and accuracy of land cover mapping using this data.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 挑战包括管理由于大量数据带来的计算负载增加，以及克服HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，这可能限制其可用性。解决这些挑战对于提高使用这些数据进行土地覆盖制图的可用性和准确性至关重要。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the use of time series HJ-1/CCD data improve land cover classification accuracy compared to single remote sensing data methods?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据可能会提高土地覆盖分类的准确性，相较于单一遥感数据方法，原因如下：
Expectation.AnswerEn: The increased information on the time dimension of time series HJ-1/CCD data improves classification accuracy for most land cover types, including water bodies, urban areas, forestlands, and croplands, leading to significant improvements in overall accuracy and Kappa coefficient.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 时间序列HJ-1/CCD数据在时间维度上的信息增加，提高了大多数土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，包括水体、城市区域、森林和农田，从而显著提高了整体准确性和Kappa系数。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What challenges might arise from using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover classification, and how could these affect expected outcomes?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类可能会面临哪些挑战，这些挑战可能会如何影响预期结果？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The challenges include increased computation loading due to the large volume of data and the not very good geometric and radiometric qualities of HJ-1/CCD data, which lower its usability and increase the difficulty in its use, potentially affecting classification accuracy.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 挑战包括由于数据量大而导致的计算负载增加，以及HJ-1/CCD数据的几何和辐射质量不佳，这降低了其可用性并增加了使用难度，可能影响分类准确性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How does the integration of very high spatial resolution data from platforms like Google Earth enhance the sampling accuracy and cost efficiency in land cover mapping?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 非常高空间分辨率数据的整合，如谷歌地球，如何提高土地覆盖制图的采样准确性和成本效率？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Integrating very high spatial resolution data from platforms like Google Earth can enhance sampling accuracy by providing detailed ground truth data, which aids in validating land cover mapping results. This approach also potentially lowers the cost associated with data acquisition and field campaigns, making it a cost-effective strategy for improving classification accuracy in land cover studies.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 整合来自谷歌地球等平台的超高空间分辨率数据可以通过提供详细的地面真实数据来提高采样准确性，这有助于验证土地覆盖制图结果。这种方法还可能降低与数据获取和实地考察相关的成本，使其成为提高土地覆盖研究分类准确性的经济有效策略。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure about how remote sensing datasets can be effectively validated to ensure accuracy.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定如何有效地验证遥感数据集以确保准确性。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Remote sensing datasets can be validated using very high-resolution remote sensing data, such as those available in Google Earth, to cross-check and validate the mapping results. This method has shown high mapping accuracy and Kappa coefficient in specific study areas, confirming the reliability of the datasets.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 遥感数据集可以通过使用非常高分辨率的遥感数据（例如Google Earth中可用的数据）进行验证，以交叉检查和验证制图结果。这种方法在特定研究区域显示出高制图准确性和Kappa系数，确认了数据集的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand the challenges involved in using optical remotely sensed imagery for land-cover classification.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不理解使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类所面临的挑战。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The primary challenge in using optical remotely sensed imagery for land-cover classification is the uncertainty caused by the spectral similarity between certain land cover types, such as cropland and grassland, especially in dryland systems. This issue is compounded by the differences in the minimum threshold required for forest cover, which can complicate classifications.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 使用光学遥感影像进行土地覆盖分类的主要挑战是某些土地覆盖类型之间的光谱相似性所导致的不确定性，例如农田和草地，尤其是在干旱地区。这一问题因森林覆盖所需的最低阈值差异而加剧，这可能会使分类变得复杂。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please evaluate the impact of NDVI time series analysis on the classification accuracy of land cover in remote sensing data.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 评估NDVI时间序列分析对遥感数据土地覆盖分类准确性的影响。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The NDVI time series analysis significantly improves the classification accuracy for land cover types by capturing the temporal dynamics of vegetation. This approach helps in differentiating various land cover features, such as water bodies and urban areas, leading to an overall accuracy improvement of 10% and enhancing the Kappa coefficient by 0.1.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: NDVI时间序列分析显著提高了土地覆盖类型的分类准确性，通过捕捉植被的时间动态。这种方法有助于区分各种土地覆盖特征，如水体和城市区域，从而整体准确性提高了10%，Kappa系数提高了0.1。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please describe the challenges encountered in using HJ-1/CCD data for land cover classification and how these challenges affect data usability.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请描述在使用HJ-1/CCD数据进行土地覆盖分类时遇到的挑战，以及这些挑战如何影响数据的可用性。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The challenges with using HJ-1/CCD data include increased computational load due to the large dataset and suboptimal geometric and radiometric qualities that lower usability. These difficulties complicate data processing and classification accuracy, necessitating additional preprocessing steps like geometric correction and radiometric calibration to improve the data quality for effective land cover mapping.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 使用HJ-1/CCD数据面临的挑战包括由于数据集庞大而导致的计算负担增加，以及几何和辐射质量不佳，降低了可用性。这些困难使得数据处理和分类精度变得复杂，需要额外的预处理步骤，如几何校正和辐射校准，以提高数据质量，从而有效进行土地覆盖制图。
